product_name: Canari Velo II Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Velo II Bike Shorts from Canari offer compression and comfort on fitness rides, whether you're in the gym or escaping the city on scenic back roads. Nylon/spandex fabric provides compression to combat muscle fatigue, dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection. 6-panel anatomical design has chafe-free flatseam stitching. Stirata stretch chamois adds comfort in the saddle. Velo II Bike Shorts have Canari signature leg grippers and an 8 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Velo II Bike Shorts from Canari offer compression and comfort on fitness rides, whether you're in the gym or escaping the city on scenic back roads.
